title: 'SSL error' when open cryptokitties.co on Android
body: # Bug Report ## Problem Opening https://www.cryptokitties.co on Android Status app browser ends with `Unable to load page. SSL error: the date of the certificate is invalid` page On iOS everything is OK. Date on Android devices is synced so it's not an issue. I also tried to update the device date to < 29th of August and also 15h September (currently certificate Dapp has states that it's `Not valid before: Saturday, 29 August 2020 at 13:23:18 Eastern European Summer Time ` and `Not valid after: Friday, 27 November 2020 at 12:23:18 Eastern European Standard Time`) but it does not make a difference #### Expected behavior Cryptokitties.co Dapp loads fine on Android #### Actual behavior Open Cryptokitties.co redirects to `https://xid.cheezewizards.com/v1/id/WollPzSg2YbRMflpsUycVBC7rxApqsFn ` and displayed as ### Reproduction - Open Status and navigate to Browser tab - Open `https://www.cryptokitties.co` ### Additional Information - Status version: release1.6/develop1.7 - Operating System: Android only Logcat for when Dapp is opened: ``` 09-02 13:46:52.003 16091 16091 D InputMethodManager: HSIFW - this is not Status related , but Android webview , same issue in MM mobile, and Trust wallets
Closing this for now as not related to status, feel free to re-open if you feel it should stay open.
